body_html: Oh, important note for QA'ers: since I updated the existing migration file in this PR (instead of adding new files for each round of reviews), you'd have to rake db:rollback twice and re-run the rake db:migrate after pulling updates.
body_text: Oh, important note for QA'ers: since I updated the existing migration file in this PR (instead of adding new files for each round of reviews), you'd have to rake db:rollback twice and re-run the rake db:migrate after pulling updates.
body: Oh, important note for QA'ers: since I updated the existing migration file in this PR (instead of adding new files for each round of reviews), you'd have to `rake db:rollback` twice and re-run the `rake db:migrate` after pulling updates.
